global_attributes__auto_apply_descriptio: applying changes without clicking the "Apply" button
global_attributes__input_readonly_descri: switch the inputs to read-only mode, but through the popover it is possible to select the date
global_attributes__clearable_description: displaying a controller for clearing a data input when it is full
global_attributes__timezone_description: which time zone will be used for date correction.
global_attributes__placeholder_descripti: a placeholder that will be displayed in the inpt when the picker is working in single mode
global_attributes__start_placeholder_des: placeholder that will be displayed in the first input when the picker is in range mode
global_attributes__end_placeholder_descr: placeholder that will be displayed in the last input when the picker is in range mode
global_attributes__align_description: the position of the popover display
global_attributes__start_id_description: id for the first native input (also used for the native input when there is only one)
global_attributes__end_id_description: id for the last native input
global_attributes__start_name_descriptio: name attribute for the first native input (also used for the native input when there is only one)
global_attributes__end_name_description: name attribute for the last native input
global_attributes__apply_text_descriptio: the text displayed in the apply button in the picker popover
global_attributes__cancel_text_descripti: the text displayed in the cancel button in the picker popover
global_attributes__invalid_description: indicates that the picker has an invalid value
global_attributes__open_delay_descriptio: delay in milliseconds before the popover opens after being triggered
global_attributes__close_delay_descripti: delay in milliseconds before the popover closes after being triggered
global_attributes__append_to_body_descri: determines if the popover content should be appended to the body instead of being nested within the DOM structure of the component
global_attributes__stay_opened_descripti: leave the picker open after opening it. Use it for debugging or researching a popover
global_attributes__client_only_popover_c: Render popover content inside <client-only> component. (Works only in SSR mode)
global_exposes__popover_visible_descript: returns whether the popover is currently open or not
global_events__change_description: triggered when the value was changed
global_events__blur_description: triggered when the picker is no longer in focus
global_default_slot__popover_visible_des: returns whether the popover is currently open or not
global_default_slot__value_description: The value that is passed to the input (without formatting)
global_default_slot__input_description: setting a new value in the picker
